medical_history.chief_complaint: 5 days of epigastric abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has experienced ongoing symptoms for 5 days. She has had episodes of nausea and vomiting without fever or chills. Previous episodes occurred, but she did not seek medical attention then. Since her ERCP, her pain has resolved, but she is currently very sleepy.
medical_history.family_history: Father with diabetes, Aunt with heart disease.
